10#ifndef VSIP_CORE_PARALLEL_CHOOSE_ASSIGN_IMPL_HPP
11#define VSIP_CORE_PARALLEL_CHOOSE_ASSIGN_IMPL_HPP
12
13/***********************************************************************
14  Included Files
15***********************************************************************/
16
17#include <vsip/core/metaprogramming.hpp>
18#include <vsip/core/block_traits.hpp>
19#include <vsip/core/parallel/map_traits.hpp>
20
21
22
23/***********************************************************************
24  Declarations
25***********************************************************************/
26
27namespace vsip
28{
29
30namespace impl
31{
32
33// Only valid if Block1 and Block2 are simple distributed blocks.
34
35#if VSIP_IMPL_PAR_SERVICE == 0 || VSIP_IMPL_PAR_SERVICE == 1
36// MPI
37template <dimension_type Dim,
38	  typename       Block1,
39	  typename       Block2,
40	  bool           EarlyBinding>
41struct Choose_par_assign_impl
42{
43  typedef typename Block1::map_type map1_type;
44  typedef typename Block2::map_type map2_type;
45
46  static int const  is_blkvec     = (Dim == 1) &&
47                                    Is_block_dist<0, map1_type>::value &&
48                                    Is_block_dist<0, map2_type>::value;
49
50  typedef typename
51  ITE_Type<is_blkvec, As_type<Blkvec_assign>, As_type<Chained_assign> >
52	::type type;
53};
54#else
55// PAS
56template <dimension_type Dim,
57	  typename       Block1,
58	  typename       Block2,
59	  bool           EarlyBinding>
60struct Choose_par_assign_impl
61{
62  static int const  is_pas_assign = Is_pas_block<Block1>::value &&
63                                    Is_pas_block<Block2>::value;
64
65  typedef typename
66  ITE_Type<is_pas_assign, 
67	   ITE_Type<EarlyBinding, As_type<Pas_assign_eb>,
68		                  As_type<Pas_assign> >,
69	   As_type<Direct_pas_assign>
70          >::type type;
71};
72#endif
73
74} // namespace vsip::impl
75} // namespace vsip
76
77#endif // VSIP_IMPL_CHOOSE_PAR_ASSIGN_IMPL_HPP
